channel.title: Lagging
channel.description:
I downloaded moparscape, and i can play it, but about 5 mins after i start playing, i lose connection, sometimes it logs back in, sometimes not, why is this?
Also, now i cant log in, its doing the same " click cancel, then start server".. errrggg someone help pl0xxx

item.title: Lagging
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Did you close your browser? Any open web browser windows and restart the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagging
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

it means the port is already in use by another program/server. to change the port u will have to open up server.java, then search for 43594 and edit it to 43595 for example. only stupid thing is, .java files are not included with the mopar install, so i recommend just downloading a server source and changeing the port of that, then run that one and play on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagging
item.dc:creator: @onetwothree onetwothree
item.description:
@onetwothree wrote:

jehanne:

maybe another program you got running uses the same port. or do you have a downloaded server source running?

Not that i know of?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 03:21:38 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Auzrulz, post:9, topic:55356”]Go to another Server, so go to Advertisement and look for a server if you have Hamachi look for one like that[/quote]

I have to dl hamachi right?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2007, 03:22:07 PM[/size][hr]nvm, auzrulz doesnt know what im talking about… thats not it… im just figuring out hope to play by my self… but it wont let me, does ANYONE know what im talking about, when i click start server, it says " Server Error, unable to start up listener on ###### - port already in use, what does that mean?, and how do i fix that?

Read full topic

item.title: Lagging
item.dc:creator: @Auzrulz Auzrulz
item.description:
@Auzrulz wrote:

Go to another Server, so go to Advertisement and look for a server if you have Hamachi look for one like that

Read full topic

item.title: Lagging
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

That means you’ve already loaded moparscape, and that it is very poorly programmed. Click on the thing that says “Quit” on the top right of the applet, and then restart it.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagging
item.dc:creator: @onetwothree onetwothree
item.description:
@onetwothree wrote:

hmm, what about when i click start server… it says " Server Error, unable to start up listener on ###### - port already in use, what does that mean?

Read full topic

item.title: Lagging
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

of course its not your net, you dont need internet to play on 127.0.0.1, thats “localhost”…
its just your computer

Read full topic
